title: Silver support looking for team
body: hey guys if ur an adc that can carry or u need a supp for a team add me

replies.body: Thanks m8 maybe don't flame and people will be nice to you :)
One game of me mucking around and you were calling me trash and don't know how to play. :'))
maybe keep it to norms then and don't spoil ranked for other people{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
Maybe don't be so butthurt ahahahahahahahaahahaahahaah
